entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:44 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
